thread.title: This is a $200 collector's edition for Final Fantasy XII: The Zodiac Age
thread.title_full: This is a $200 collector's edition for Final Fantasy XII: The Zodiac Age

author: Jordan Devore
title: This is a $200 collector's edition for Final Fantasy XII: The Zodiac Age
text:
0 
Hey, big spender 
I won't say that literally every collector's edition I've purchased ended in regret, but that has quite often been my experience once a few months pass after the game's release and those sky-high prices start to plummet. Something to keep in mind as we look over this $200 special-edition set for Final Fantasy XII: The Zodiac Age with its cool-but-probably-not- that -cool Judge Magister busts. You are logged out. Login | Sign up 
Unsurprisingly, this exorbitant collector's edition is exclusive to the Square Enix Online Store. 
This one with just the fancy case is a much more palatable $50, and that art rules. 
And here's the standard edition, complete with an alternate cover. 
Okay, last one, then we're outta here . That's the PlayStation 4 theme you get with a digital pre-order.
